title: How to Grate Cold Butter for Flaky Pastry Dough
description:
Making a flaky dough recipe that calls for cold butter? Chill the butter before grating to make fluffy shreds that easily incorporate into your dough mixture while remaining cold.

Have any good tips? Share them with us on Twitter and Instagram using the

asset.author: OXO
asset.hookText:
Making a flaky dough recipe that calls for cold butter? Chill the butter before grating to make fluffy shreds that easily incorporate into your dough mixture while remaining cold.

Have any good tips? Share them with us on Twitter and Instagram using the hashtag #OXOGoodTips.
